header.title: Assembly Instructions for Model XYZ-100 Widget
header.author: Jane Smith

steps.title: Prepare the Main Frame
steps.description: Remove the Main Frame Assembly from packaging and place on a clean, flat surface. Ensure all protective coverings are removed.
warnings: Wear gloves to avoid fingerprints on painted surfaces
Inspect for shipping damage before proceeding

steps.title: Install Control Panel
steps.description: Align the Control Panel with the mounting points on the Main Frame Assembly. Ensure the connector is properly oriented.
warnings: ESD sensitive components - use grounding strap

substeps.description: Connect the ribbon cable from the Main Frame to the Control Panel
Secure the Control Panel using 4 screws (included with P-10046)

notes: These instructions are for trained personnel only
Allow approximately 30 minutes for complete assembly
Refer to calibration procedure PROC-2025-0015 after assembly
